messages.subject: Not Back to School Camp
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yes, Cameron has been two years. The first year he went to the east coast camp. The second year he went to one session in the east and one in the west.
messages.messageBody:
>>>>Has anyone on this list kids gone to Grace Llewellyn's camp?<<<<<<

Yes, Cameron has been two years. The first year he went to the east
coast camp. The second year he went to one session in the east and one
in the west. He's hooked. It's been a rgeat experience for him, and
he's made (more) friends from all over the country.

What would you like to know?

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org
